option.name: originalContent
option.value:
# IdeaNest
IdeaNest is a collaborative project management platform designed specifically for academic institutions. It facilitates seamless project submission, review, and collaboration between students, faculty, and administrators.
## Features
### For Students - **Project Submission**: Easy submission of academic projects with support for multiple file types - **Project Types**: Support for both software and hardware projects - **Rich Media Upload**: Upload images, videos, code files, and documentation - **Project Tracking**: Track project approval status - **Bookmarking**: Save interesting projects for future reference - **Profile Management**: Manage personal and academic information
### For Administrators - **Project Management**: Review, approve, or reject student projects - **User Management**: Manage student and sub-admin accounts - **Email Notifications**: Automated email notifications for project status changes - **Settings Management**: Configure system-wide settings - **Analytics**: Track project submissions and user activities
### For Sub-Admins - **Specialized Review**: Domain-specific project review capabilities - **Classification Management**: Handle specific project categories - **Profile Customization**: Set expertise domains and classifications
## ️ Technical Stack
- **Frontend**: HTML, CSS, JavaScript - **Backend**: PHP - **Database**: MySQL - **Email Service**: PHPMailer - **Server**: Apache
## Prerequisites
- PHP 8.2.4 or higher - MySQL 10.4.28-MariaDB or higher - Apache web server - Composer for dependency management
## Installation
1. Clone the repository: ```bash git clone https://github.com/yourusername/IdeaNest.git ```
2. Import the database: ```bash mysql -u your_username -p your_database_name < ideanest.sql ```
3. Install dependencies: ```bash composer install ```
4. Configure your environment: - Update database credentials in `Login/Login/db.php` - Configure email settings in admin settings panel
## Project Structure
``` IdeaNest/ ├── Admin/ # Admin panel and management ├── Login/ # Authentication system ├── user/ # User interface and features ├── db/ # Database scripts └── vendor/ # Dependencies ```
## Contributing
We welcome contributions to IdeaNest! Here's how you can help:
1. Fork the repository 2. Create a feature branch (`git checkout -b feature/AmazingFeature`) 3. Make your changes 4. Commit your changes (`git commit -m 'Add some AmazingFeature'`) 5. Push to the branch (`git push origin feature/AmazingFeature`) 6. Open a Pull Request
### Contribution Guidelines
- Follow the existing code style and conventions - Write clear commit messages - Update documentation for significant changes - Add tests when possible - Ensure your code passes existing tests
## License
This project is licensed under the MIT License - see the LICENSE file for details.
## Acknowledgments
- All contributors who have helped shape IdeaNest - The open-source community for providing excellent tools and libraries - Academic institutions for their valuable feedback and support
## Contact
For support or queries, please reach out to the project maintainers: - Email: ideanest.ict@gmail.com ## Updates and Maintenance
The project is actively maintained and regularly updated. Check the releases page for the latest updates and changelogs.

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# IdeaNest
IdeaNest is a collaborative project management platform designed specifically for academic institutions. It facilitates seamless project submission, review, and collaboration between students, faculty, and administrators.
## Features
### For Students - **Project Submission**: Easy submission of academic projects with support for multiple file types - **Project Types**: Support for both software and hardware projects - **Rich Media Upload**: Upload images, videos, code files, and documentation - **Project Tracking**: Track project approval status - **Bookmarking**: Save interesting projects for future reference - **Profile Management**: Manage personal and academic information
### For Administrators - **Project Management**: Review, approve, or reject student projects - **User Management**: Manage student and sub-admin accounts - **Email Notifications**: Automated email notifications for project status changes - **Settings Management**: Configure system-wide settings - **Analytics**: Track project submissions and user activities
### For Sub-Admins - **Specialized Review**: Domain-specific project review capabilities - **Classification Management**: Handle specific project categories - **Profile Customization**: Set expertise domains and classifications
## ️ Technical Stack
- **Frontend**: HTML, CSS, JavaScript - **Backend**: PHP - **Database**: MySQL - **Email Service**: PHPMailer - **Server**: Apache
## Prerequisites
- PHP 8.2.4 or higher - MySQL 10.4.28-MariaDB or higher - Apache web server - Composer for dependency management
## Installation
1. Clone the repository: ```bash git clone https://github.com/yourusername/IdeaNest.git ```
2. Import the database: ```bash mysql -u your_username -p your_database_name < ideanest.sql ```
3. Install dependencies: ```bash composer install ```
4. Configure your environment: - Update database credentials in `Login/Login/db.php` - Configure email settings in admin settings panel
## Project Structure
``` IdeaNest/ ├── Admin/ # Admin panel and management ├── Login/ # Authentication system ├── user/ # User interface and features ├── db/ # Database scripts └── vendor/ # Dependencies ```
## Security Features
### Authentication & Authorization - JWT-based authentication system - Role-based access control (RBAC) - Session management with secure token handling - Password hashing using bcrypt - CSRF protection implementation - XSS prevention mechanisms
### Data Protection - Input validation and sanitization - Prepared statements for SQL queries - File upload validation and scanning - Rate limiting implementation - SSL/TLS encryption for data transmission
## Advanced Deployment
### Docker Deployment ```dockerfile FROM php:8.2-apache RUN docker-php-ext-install pdo pdo_mysql COPY . /var/www/html/ ```
### Server Requirements - **PHP Configuration** ```ini upload_max_filesize = 100M post_max_size = 100M max_execution_time = 300 memory_limit = 256M ``` - **Apache Configuration** ```apache <Directory /var/www/html/IdeaNest> Options Indexes FollowSymLinks MultiViews AllowOverride All Require all granted </Directory> ```
### Load Balancing Setup - Nginx reverse proxy configuration - Horizontal scaling support - Session management across multiple servers
## Database Schema & Optimization
### Key Tables ```sql -- Projects Table Indexing CREATE INDEX idx_project_status ON projects(status); CREATE INDEX idx_submission_date ON projects(submission_date);
-- Composite Indexes CREATE INDEX idx_project_search ON projects(project_type, classification, status); ```
### Query Optimization - Implemented database caching - Query execution plan optimization - Table partitioning for large datasets
## API Integration
### RESTful API Endpoints ``` GET /api/v1/projects POST /api/v1/projects PUT /api/v1/projects/{id} DELETE /api/v1/projects/{id} ```
### WebSocket Implementation - Real-time notification system - Live collaboration features - Chat functionality
## Performance Optimization
### Caching Strategy - Redis implementation for session storage - Memcached for database query caching - Browser caching configuration - CDN integration for static assets
### Code Optimization - Lazy loading implementation - Asset minification and bundling - Image optimization pipeline - Gzip compression
## Monitoring & Logging
### System Monitoring - Error logging and tracking - Performance metrics collection - User activity monitoring - Resource usage tracking
### Log Management ```php // Log configuration 'log' => [ 'daily' => true, 'level' => env('LOG_LEVEL', 'debug'), 'days' => 14, ] ```
## CI/CD Pipeline
### GitHub Actions Workflow ```yaml name: IdeaNest CI/CD on: push: branches: [ main ] pull_request: branches: [ main ]
jobs: build: runs-on: ubuntu-latest steps: - uses: actions/checkout@v2 - name: Setup PHP uses: shivammathur/setup-php@v2 with: php-version: '8.2' ```
### Testing Strategy - Unit testing with PHPUnit - Integration testing - End-to-end testing - Load testing configuration
## Progressive Web App Features
- Offline functionality - Push notifications - App manifest configuration - Service worker implementation
## Third-Party Integrations
- GitHub OAuth integration - Google Analytics setup - Payment gateway integration - Cloud storage services
## ️ Backup & Disaster Recovery
### Backup Strategy ```bash # Automated backup script #!/bin/bash mysqldump -u user -p database > backup_$(date +%Y%m%d).sql ```
### Recovery Procedures - Point-in-time recovery - Automated backup verification - Failover configuration
## Contributing
We welcome contributions to IdeaNest! Here's how you can help:
1. Fork the repository 2. Create a feature branch (`git checkout -b feature/AmazingFeature`) 3. Make your changes 4. Commit your changes (`git commit -m 'Add some AmazingFeature'`) 5. Push to the branch (`git push origin feature/AmazingFeature`) 6. Open a Pull Request
### Contribution Guidelines
- Follow the existing code style and conventions - Write clear commit messages - Update documentation for significant changes - Add tests when possible - Ensure your code passes existing tests
## License
This project is licensed under the MIT License - see the LICENSE file for details.
## Acknowledgments
- All contributors who have helped shape IdeaNest - The open-source community for providing excellent tools and libraries - Academic institutions for their valuable feedback and support
## Contact
For support or queries, please reach out to the project maintainers: - Email: ideanest.ict@gmail.com ## Updates and Maintenance
The project is actively maintained and regularly updated. Check the releases page for the latest updates and changelogs.
